markdown: | rewardname2 = Destroy the pillar | reward2 = Minor Positive reputation with the VTC;{{cp2|1700}} | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = For the Republics! | conc = The Storms of Poko Kohara;Dim Prospects | next = Dirty Laundry | internalname = FCT_QST_VTC01_Poko_Kohara | guid = c0f05e98-ced9-4245-ad8f-ba4552eb81bc }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [faction quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsFactionQuest/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis The Vailian Trading Company sent an expeditionary force to find the island of Poko Kohara. They never returned. The Watcher is asked by the Vailian Trading Company to track down the original expedition to Poko Kohara and, if necessary, complete their assignment. The first step is sailing to Tikawara. ## Walkthrough * This is a faction quest tied to [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/). The VTC wants the pillar restored, while the RDC wants it destroyed permanently. * Return to the governor once the quest is complete. She will escort you to [Director Castol](/directorCastol/) who will debrief you on the quest, thanking you for providing information as to the outcome of the expedition. ** If you restored the pillar, you will gain Major Positive reputation with the VTC, and {{cp2|1700}}. ** If you destroyed the pillar, you will gain Minor Positive reputation with the VTC, and {{cp2|1700}}. ## Bugs * Upon first speaking with [Lueva Alvari](/luevaAlvari/), leaving the dialogue before asking "What kind of work?" will cause the quest to be unobtainable (until much later), since the dialogue used to initiate the quest will not appear the next time you speak with her. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/XX_VTC_Faction_Questline/FCT_QST_VTC01_Poko_Kohara.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Terms of Trade''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | The Vailian Trading Company sent an expeditionary force to find the island of Poko Kohara. They never returned. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Investigate the situation at Poko Kohara.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | I have been asked by the Vailian Trading Company to track down the original expedition to Poko Kohara and, if necessary, complete their assignment. The first step is sailing to Tikawara. I've been promised a reward if I can resolve matters in the Vailian Trading Company's favor. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to the Vailian Trading Company headquarters at Queen's Berth.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Company representatives will want to know what happened at Poko Kohara. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | Someone critical to the completion of this quest has been killed. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I made my report to the Vailian Trading Company, and received my reward. There's more paying work to be found with the Vailians, if I want it. |}

title: Terms of Trade
